CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.Name="Sole Proprietorship", LEFT(First_Name__c,3)+LEFT(Last_Name__c,3)+MID(Residential_Phone__c,2,3)+MID(Residential_Phone__c,7,3)+MID(Residential_Phone__c,11,4), IF( (RecordType.Name="Corp or LLC" || RecordType.Name="Joint Venture" || RecordType.Name="Limited Partnership" || RecordType.Name="Partnership" || RecordType.Name="Parent Company"), LEFT(First_Name__c,3)+LEFT(Last_Name__c,3)+LEFT(Federal_Employer_Identification_Number__c,9),null))
CustomField.label: Unique ID
